org.apache.iceberg

Class ManifestWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.iceberg.ManifestWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, FileAppender<DataFile>

    public class ManifestWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileAppender<DataFile>
    Writer for manifest files.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static ManifestWriter write(PartitionSpec spec,
                                   OutputFile outputFile)
        Create a new ManifestWriter.

        Manifests created by this writer are not part of a snapshot and have all entry snapshot IDs set to -1.

        Parameters:
        spec - PartitionSpec used to produce DataFile partition tuples
        outputFile - the destination file location
        Returns:
        a manifest writer

      • add

        public void add(DataFile addedFile)
        Add an added entry for a data file.

        The entry's snapshot ID will be this manifest's snapshot ID.

        Specified by:
        add in interface FileAppender<DataFile>
        Parameters:
        addedFile - a data file

      • add

        public void existing(DataFile existingFile,
                     long fileSnapshotId)
        Add an existing entry for a data file.
        Parameters:
        existingFile - a data file
        fileSnapshotId - snapshot ID when the data file was added to the table

      • delete

        public void delete(DataFile deletedFile)
        Add a delete entry for a data file.

        The entry's snapshot ID will be this manifest's snapshot ID.

        Parameters:
        deletedFile - a data file
